title: can't get into my game Help
body: When I try to play a game, the game disappear after character select and not allowing to be playing the game I entered for on my Mac. Help me

replies.body:
A lot of issues on the Mac client are caused by a poor connection to the servers. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
same problem, but on windows. havent found a solution yet{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
